headline: Can Campbell's (CPB) New Snacks Chief Subtly Rebalance Its Growth And Margin Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, Campbell’s appointed Mohit Anand as Executive Vice President and President, Snacks, placing him in charge of brands such as Goldfish, Pepperidge Farm, Snyder’s of Hanover, Lance, Kettle Brand, Cape Cod, Snack Factory and Late July. His arrival from Kellanova and Mars comes as Campbell’s snacks unit faces stagnant volumes and profitability pressure, raising the stakes for a turnaround. We’ll now examine how Anand’s appointment to lead the Snacks division could reshape...
